ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans (' L I S T I S E M P T Y ')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT debc_no, debc_debc, debc_debh, cast(ifnull(( select sum(dcmo_totasalesdebtnotes) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and dcmo_currency=':5' and dcmo_year= :6 and dcmo_month between :7 and :8 ),0)as decimal (13,2)), cast(ifnull(( select sum(dcmo_totasalescrednotes) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and dcmo_currency=':5' and dcmo_year= :6 and dcmo_month between :7 and :8 ),0)as decimal (13,2)), cast(ifnull(( select sum(dcmo_balance) from :1/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and dcmo_currency=':5' and dcmo_year= :6 and dcmo_month between :7 and :8 ),0)as decimal (13,2))
FROM :1/debc
where debc_admno=:2 and debc_clntno=:3 :4
order by debc_debc_sort
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- Build static text fields
-- Reportheader (debtor)
--data fields for reportheader(debtor)
statistical variables to be filled by BXA471E
if there's no debtors to print
print front page only if report printed for all clients debtors
only debtor with balance will be printed
page skip only if report printed for all clients debtors
and not for the first debtor

SQL_STMT_U.val:
SELECT CLHS_CURRENCYNEW, CLHS_LIMITNEW
FROM :1/CLHS
WHERE CLHS_DEBC_NO=:2 and CLHS_TYPE='F'and CLHS_DATCHANGED<=':3'
Order by CLHS_DATCHANGED DESC

SELECT CLHS_CURRENCYNEW, CLHS_LIMITNEW
FROM :1/CLHS
WHERE CLHS_DEBC_NO=:2 and CLHS_TYPE='C'and CLHS_DATCHANGED<=':3'
Order by CLHS_DATCHANGED DESC

SELECT DRIH_REINSURANCELIMITCURR, DRIH_REINSURANCELIMIT
FROM :1/DRIH
WHERE DRIH_DEBC_NO=:2 and DRIH_DATSTARTING<=':3'
Order by DRIH_DATSTARTING DESC

SELECT INVO_NO, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AINITIALC, INVO_AINITIALI, cast(ifnull(INVO_AINITIALC - ( select sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO=INVO_NO and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE<':3' ),INVO_AINITIALC )as decimal(13,2) ), cast(ifnull(INVO_AINITIALI - ( select sum(BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_INVO_NO=INVO_NO and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE<':3' ),INVO_AINITIALI )as decimal(13,2) ), BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC, BPIV_AMOUNTCURRINV, BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE
FROM :1/INVO left join :1/BPIV on BPIV_INVO_NO=INVO_NO and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE<=':3'
WHERE ( INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE is null and INVO_INVDATE<=':3' or INVO_FINALPAYMENTDATE between ':2' and':3' or INVO_INVDATE between ':2' and':3' ) and INVO_DEBC_NO = :4
ORDER BY INVO_INVDATE,INVO_INVOICENO
